title: Who won the US presidential debate?
content: The former president couldn't resist his rival's personal digs at the debate which threw him off message, writes Anthony Zurcher.
summary: The former president couldn't resist his rival's personal digs at the debate which threw him off message, writes Anthony Zurcher.

title: Biden hints at ending Ukraine long-range weapons restrictions
